instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: Hello -> Hi there
output: 👋 Hello back, 😊 Nice to see you, 💬 How are you, 🌟 Good to meet

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: Hello -> How are you
output: 😊 Pretty good, 😐 Okay I guess, 😔 Not so great, 💭 Let me think

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: Hello -> What are you doing
output: 💭 Just thinking, 📺 Watching TV, 🍽️ Eating food, 🎮 Playing games

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: Hello -> Where are you going
output: 🏠 Going home, 🏪 To the store, 🚗 For a drive, 🤷 Not sure yet

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: I need help -> What do you need
output: 🤔 Not sure exactly, 💭 Hard to explain, 🤲 Many things, 📝 Let me think

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: I need help -> How can I help
output: 🤗 Just be here, 💪 Give me strength, 🧠 Help me think, 🎯 Show me way

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: I need help -> What happened
output: 😔 Long story, 💔 Feeling overwhelmed, 🌀 Everything at once, ⏰ Bad day

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: I need help -> Are you okay
output: 😐 Not really, 💪 Trying to be, 🤗 Need support, 🌈 Will get better

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: I feel sad -> Why are you sad
output: 💔 Many reasons, 😔 Hard to explain, 🤷 Not sure why, 💭 Long story

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: I feel sad -> What happened
output: 😢 Bad day, 💔 Someone hurt me, 😞 Things went wrong, 🌧️ Just feeling down

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: I feel sad -> Can I help
output: 🤗 Just listen, 💪 Give me hope, 🌈 Remind me better days, ⏰ Be patient

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: I feel sad -> Do you want to talk
output: 💬 Maybe later, 😔 Not ready yet, 🤗 Just need comfort, 👥 Stay with me

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: I want to go out -> Where do you want to go
input: Where do you want to go
output: 🌳 To the park, 🏪 To the store, 🚗 For a drive, 🤷 Anywhere really

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: I want to go out -> When do you want to go
input: When do you want to go
output: ⏰ Right now, 🕐 Later today, 🌅 Tomorrow maybe, 🤔 When ready

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: I want to go out -> Who will go with you
output: 👥 Want company, 🤗 You come too, 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Family maybe, 🚶 Go alone

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: I want to go out -> How will you get there
output: 🚗 Drive car, 🚌 Take bus, 🚶 Walk there, 🚕 Call taxi

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: Something is wrong -> What is wrong
output: 💭 Hard to say, 🤔 Not sure exactly, 😰 Feels off, 🌀 Everything

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: Something is wrong -> When did it start
output: ⏰ Just now, 🌅 This morning, 📅 Few days ago, 🤷 Been while

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: Something is wrong -> How does it feel
output: 😰 Scary feeling, 💔 Heart hurts, 🤢 Sick feeling, 😵 Dizzy

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: Something is wrong -> Do you need a doctor
output: 👨‍⚕️ Maybe yes, 🤔 Not sure, 😰 Am scared, ⏰ Wait and see

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: I am getting ready -> Ready for what
output: 💼 For work, 🏫 For school, 🛒 To go shopping, 🎉 For party

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: I am getting ready -> What do you need to do
input: What do you need to do
output: 🚿 Take shower, 👕 Get dressed, 🍳 Eat breakfast, 🚗 Get keys

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: I am getting ready -> Are you running late
output: ⏰ Little late, 🏃 Need to hurry, 😰 Very late, 😌 Have time

instruction: AAC Conversation Flow: I am getting ready -> Do you need help
output: 🤗 Yes please, 💪 I can do it, 🤔 Maybe little, 🙏 Thank you

instruction: AAC Conversation Follow-up: after expressing sadness
output: 🤗 Always here, ❤️ Care about you, 💪 You are strong, 🌈 Better days coming

instruction: AAC Conversation Follow-up: after expressing sadness
output: 😊 Good to hear, 🌟 Progress made, 💪 Keep going, 🤗 Proud of you

instruction: AAC Conversation Follow-up: after expressing sadness
output: 💔 Understand that, ⏰ Takes time, 🤗 Not alone, 💪 Will get through

instruction: AAC Conversation Follow-up: after expressing sadness
output: 🧘 Take deep breaths, 🚶 Go for walk, 📞 Call friend, 🛌 Rest if tired

instruction: AAC Conversation Follow-up: after making plans
output: 🕐 Up to you, ⏰ When ready, 🌅 Earlier better, 🌆 Later fine

instruction: AAC Conversation Follow-up: after making plans
output: 💧 Bring water, 💰 Bring money, 📱 Bring phone, 🤷 Not sure

instruction: AAC Conversation Follow-up: after making plans
output: ☔ Check weather, 🏠 Stay inside, 🌂 Bring umbrella, 📅 Go tomorrow

instruction: AAC Conversation Follow-up: after making plans
output: 🤷 That happens, 😊 No problem, 💭 Think about it, ✅ Whatever works

instruction: AAC Conversation Follow-up: after identifying problem
input: I think I know what to do
output: 💪 Good for you, 🎯 Make plan, 🤗 You got this, ⭐ Believe in you

instruction: AAC Conversation Follow-up: after identifying problem
output: 🤲 Ask someone, 📞 Call expert, 👥 Get support, 💪 Team effort

instruction: AAC Conversation Follow-up: after identifying problem
output: 🚨 Get help now, 👨‍⚕️ Call doctor, 📞 Emergency number, 🏥 Go hospital

instruction: AAC Conversation Follow-up: after identifying problem
output: 🧘 Take breaks, 📝 One step time, 🤗 Not alone, 💪 Can handle this

instruction: AAC Contextual Response: at doctor office
output: 🤒 Not well, 🤕 Something hurts, 😰 Am worried, 💊 Need medicine

instruction: AAC Contextual Response: at doctor office
output: 😷 Feel sick, 🤕 Got injured, 💊 Need checkup, 🧠 Mental health

instruction: AAC Contextual Response: at doctor office
output: 🤕 Yes hurts, 😐 Little bit, 🚫 No pain, 🤔 Hard to tell

instruction: AAC Contextual Response: at doctor office
output: 💊 Yes these ones, 🚫 No medicine, 📋 Check my list, 🤔 Not sure

instruction: AAC Contextual Response: at grocery store
input: Can I help you find something
output: 📝 Looking for items, 🛒 Just browsing, 🤔 Where is milk, 🙏 Yes please

instruction: AAC Contextual Response: at grocery store
input: Do you have a rewards card
output: 💳 Yes here it is, 🚫 No card, 📱 On my phone, 🤔 What is that

instruction: AAC Contextual Response: at grocery store
output: 📦 Plastic please, 📄 Paper bags, 🛍️ Bring own bags, 🤷 Either fine

instruction: AAC Contextual Response: at grocery store
output: ✅ Got everything, 🤔 Missing some items, 📝 Check my list, 😊 All good

instruction: AAC Contextual Response: at work
output: 💼 Going well, 😰 Having trouble, 🤔 Need more time, 🤲 Need help

instruction: AAC Contextual Response: at work
output: ⏰ Yes can stay, 🏠 Need to go home, 📅 Maybe tomorrow, 🤔 How late

instruction: AAC Contextual Response: at work
output: ✅ Understand it, 🤔 Few questions, 😰 Very confused, 📚 Need training

instruction: AAC Contextual Response: at work
output: 📋 All prepared, 😰 Need more time, 📝 Have questions, 💻 Technical problems

instruction: AAC Contextual Response: at home with family
input: What do you want for dinner
output: 🍕 Order pizza, 🍳 Cook something, 🥪 Make sandwich, 🤷 You choose

instruction: AAC Contextual Response: at home with family
output: 😊 Really good day, 😐 Okay I guess, 😔 Not great, 🎉 Amazing day

instruction: AAC Contextual Response: at home with family
output: 📺 Yes sounds fun, 📚 Rather read, 😴 Too tired, 🎮 Play games instead

instruction: AAC Contextual Response: at home with family
output: 🤗 Just company, 💪 Yes please, 😊 I am good, 🧹 Help clean
